item.title: Illegally put up flags, 8th September
item.description:
There are flags on almost all lamp posts in the area. They have been put up without legal authorisation, and represent discrimination. We don't want them, but they are too high up for us to safely take them down. This has been an issue for a few weeks now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blacksmiths Lane, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping again - Mattress and other items, 8th September

item.title: Debris from accident on Sunday night, 8th September
item.description:
As per reference 8130052 which was closed incorrectly. Following an accident on Sunday early morning there is a lot of debris from the damaged vehicles on the pavements and on the road please come to clean up the mess. Also two bollards have been knocked down. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crescent Road, Beckenham, London
